<h1 align="center">
  ScottEnock.com
</h1>

This is the source code of my personal web development website: scottenock.com.

The style and layout was heavily inspired by Tania Rascia's [website](https://www.taniarascia.com/).

## Licencing

The source code for this website is open source and can be used how you see fit with the exception of the articles written (located in the `./src/posts` folder).
